methods.name: starknet_specVersion
methods.summary: Returns the version of the Starknet JSON-RPC specification being used

result.name: result
result.description: Semver of Starknet's JSON-RPC spec being used

methods.name: starknet_getBlockWithTxHashes

params.name: block_id
params.description: The hash of the requested block, or number (height) of the requested block, or a block tag

result.name: result
result.description: The resulting block information with transaction hashes

methods.name: starknet_getBlockWithTxs
methods.summary: Get block information with full transactions given the block id

params.description: The hash of the requested block, or number (height) of the requested block, or a block tag

result.name: result
result.description: The resulting block information with full transactions

schema.title: Starknet get block with txs result

methods.name: starknet_getBlockWithReceipts

params.description: The hash of the requested block, or number (height) of the requested block, or a block tag

result.name: result
result.description: The resulting block information with full transactions

schema.title: Starknet get block with txs and receipts result

methods.name: starknet_getStateUpdate

params.description: The hash of the requested block, or number (height) of the requested block, or a block tag

result.name: result
result.description: The information about the state update of the requested block

methods.name: starknet_getStorageAt
methods.summary: Get the value of the storage at the given address and key

params.name: contract_address
params.description: The address of the contract to read from
params.summary: The address of the contract to read from

params.name: key
params.description: The key to the storage value for the given contract
params.summary: The key to the storage value for the given contract

params.name: block_id
params.description: The hash of the requested block, or number (height) of the requested block, or a block tag

result.name: result
result.description: The value at the given key for the given contract. 0 if no value is found
result.summary: The value at the given key for the given contract.

methods.name: starknet_getTransactionStatus
methods.summary: Gets the transaction status (possibly reflecting that the tx is still in the mempool, or dropped from it)

params.name: transaction_hash
params.summary: The hash of the requested transaction

methods.name: starknet_getMessagesStatus
methods.summary: Given an l1 tx hash, returns the associated l1_handler tx hashes and statuses for all L1 -> L2 messages sent by the l1 transaction, ordered by the l1 tx sending order

params.name: transaction_hash
params.summary: The hash of the L1 transaction that sent L1->L2 messages

failure_reason.title: failure reason
failure_reason.description: The failure reason. Only appears if `execution_status` is REVERTED

methods.name: starknet_getTransactionByHash
methods.summary: Get the details and status of a submitted transaction

params.name: transaction_hash
params.summary: The hash of the requested transaction

methods.name: starknet_getTransactionByBlockIdAndIndex
methods.summary: Get the details of a transaction by a given block id and index
methods.description: Get the details of the transaction given by the identified block and index in that block. If no transaction is found, null is returned.

params.name: block_id
params.description: The hash of the requested block, or number (height) of the requested block, or a block tag

params.name: index
params.summary: The index in the block to search for the transaction

methods.name: starknet_getTransactionReceipt
methods.summary: Get the transaction receipt by the transaction hash

params.name: transaction_hash
params.summary: The hash of the requested transaction

methods.name: starknet_getClass

params.description: The hash of the requested block, or number (height) of the requested block, or a block tag

params.name: class_hash
params.description: The hash of the requested contract class

result.name: result
result.description: The contract class, if found

methods.name: starknet_getClassHashAt
methods.summary: Get the contract class hash in the given block for the contract deployed at the given address

params.description: The hash of the requested block, or number (height) of the requested block, or a block tag

params.name: contract_address
params.description: The address of the contract whose class hash will be returned

result.name: result
result.description: The class hash of the given contract

methods.name: starknet_getClassAt
methods.summary: Get the contract class definition in the given block at the given address

params.name: contract_address

methods.name: starknet_getBlockTransactionCount
methods.summary: Get the number of transactions in a block given a block id
methods.description: Returns the number of transactions in the designated block.

params.name: block_id
params.description: The hash of the requested block, or number (height) of the requested block, or a block tag

result.name: result
result.description: The number of transactions in the designated block
result.summary: The number of transactions in the designated block

methods.name: starknet_call
methods.summary: call a starknet function without creating a StarkNet transaction
methods.description: Calls a function in a contract and returns the return value.  Using this call will not create a transaction; hence, will not change the state

params.name: request
params.summary: The details of the function call

params.name: block_id
params.description: The hash of the requested block, or number (height) of the requested block, or a block tag, for the block referencing the state or call the transaction on.

result.name: result
result.description: The function's return value, as defined in the Cairo output

methods.name: starknet_estimateFee
methods.summary: estimate the fee for of StarkNet transactions
methods.description: Estimates the resources required by a given sequence of transactions when applied on a given state. If one of the transactions reverts or fails due to any reason (e.g. validation failure or an internal error), a TRANSACTION_EXECUTION_ERROR is returned. The estimate is given in fri.

schema.description: a sequence of transactions to estimate, running each transaction on the state resulting from applying all the previous ones
schema.title: Transaction

params.name: simulation_flags
params.description: describes what parts of the transaction should be executed

params.name: block_id
params.description: The hash of the requested block, or number (height) of the requested block, or a block tag, for the block referencing the state or call the transaction on.

result.name: result
result.description: The fee estimations

schema.title: Estimation
schema.description: a sequence of fee estimation where the i'th estimate corresponds to the i'th transaction

methods.name: starknet_estimateMessageFee
methods.summary: estimate the L2 fee of a message sent on L1
methods.description: estimates the resources required by the l1_handler transaction induced by the message

params.name: message
params.description: the message's parameters

params.name: block_id
params.description: The hash of the requested block, or number (height) of the requested block, or a block tag, for the block referencing the state or call the transaction on.

result.name: result
result.description: The fee estimation

result.name: result
result.description: The latest block hash and number

schema.title: Starknet block hash and number result

methods.name: starknet_chainId
methods.summary: Return the currently configured StarkNet chain id

result.name: result
result.description: The chain id this node is connected to

methods.name: starknet_syncing
methods.summary: Returns an object about the sync status, or false if the node is not synching

result.name: syncing
result.summary: The state of the synchronization, or false if the node is not synchronizing
result.description: The status of the node, if it is currently synchronizing state. FALSE otherwise

oneOf.title: False
oneOf.description: only legal value is FALSE here

methods.name: starknet_getEvents
methods.summary: Returns all events matching the given filter
methods.description: Returns all event objects matching the conditions in the provided filter

params.name: filter
params.summary: The conditions used to filter the returned events

result.name: events
result.description: All the event objects matching the filter

methods.name: starknet_getNonce
methods.summary: Get the nonce associated with the given address in the given block

params.name: block_id
params.description: The hash of the requested block, or number (height) of the requested block, or a block tag

params.name: contract_address
params.description: The address of the contract whose nonce we're seeking

result.name: result
result.description: The contract's nonce at the requested state

methods.name: starknet_getStorageProof
methods.summary: Get merkle paths in one of the state tries: global state, classes, individual contract. A single request can query for any mix of the three types of storage proofs (classes, contracts, and storage).

params.name: block_id
params.description: The hash of the requested block, or number (height) of the requested block, or a block tag

params.name: class_hashes
params.description: a list of the class hashes for which we want to prove membership in the classes trie

params.name: contract_addresses
params.description: a list of contracts for which we want to prove membership in the global state trie

params.name: contracts_storage_keys
params.description: a list of (contract_address, storage_keys) pairs

result.name: result
result.description: The requested storage proofs. Note that if a requested leaf has the default value, the path to it may end in an edge node whose path is not a prefix of the requested leaf, thus effectively proving non-membership

nodes.description: The nodes in the union of the paths from the contracts tree root to the requested leaves

items.description: The nonce and class hash for each requested contract address, in the order in which they appear in the request. These values are needed to construct the associated leaf node

block_hash.description: the associated block hash (needed in case the caller used a block tag for the block_id parameter)

continuation_token.title: Continuation token
continuation_token.description: Use this token in a subsequent query to obtain the next page. Should not appear if there are no more pages.

continuation_token.title: Continuation token
continuation_token.description: The token returned from the previous query. If no token is provided the first page is returned.

EMITTED_EVENT.title: Emitted event
EMITTED_EVENT.description: Event information decorated with metadata on where it was emitted / An event emitted as a result of transaction execution

block_hash.title: Block hash
block_hash.description: The hash of the block in which the event was emitted

block_number.title: Block number
block_number.description: The number of the block in which the event was emitted

transaction_hash.title: Transaction hash
transaction_hash.description: The transaction that emitted the event

transaction_index.title: Transaction index
transaction_index.description: The index of the transaction in the block by which the event was emitted

event_index.title: Event index
event_index.description: The index of the event in the transaction by which it was emitted

items.title: Keys
items.description: Per key (by position), designate the possible values to be matched for events to be returned. Empty array designates 'any' value

BLOCK_TAG.title: Block tag
BLOCK_TAG.description: A tag specifying a dynamic reference to a block. Tag `l1_accepted` refers to the latest Starknet block which was included in a state update on L1 and finalized by the consensus on L1. Tag `latest` refers to the latest Starknet block finalized by the consensus on L2. Tag `pre_confirmed` refers to the block which is currently being built by the block proposer in height `latest` + 1.

SYNC_STATUS.title: Sync status
SYNC_STATUS.description: An object describing the node synchronization status

starting_block_hash.title: Starting block hash
starting_block_hash.description: The hash of the block from which the sync started

starting_block_num.title: Starting block number
starting_block_num.description: The number (height) of the block from which the sync started

current_block_hash.title: Current block hash
current_block_hash.description: The hash of the current block being synchronized

current_block_num.title: Current block number
current_block_num.description: The number (height) of the current block being synchronized

highest_block_hash.title: Highest block hash
highest_block_hash.description: The hash of the estimated highest block to be synchronized

highest_block_num.title: Highest block number
highest_block_num.description: The number (height) of the estimated highest block to be synchronized

NUM_AS_HEX.title: Number as hex
NUM_AS_HEX.description: An unsigned integer number in hex format (0x...)

u64.title: u64
u64.description: 64 bit unsigned integers, represented by hex string of length at most 16

u128.title: u128
u128.description: 128 bit unsigned integers, represented by hex string of length at most 32

CHAIN_ID.title: Chain id
CHAIN_ID.description: StarkNet chain id, given in hex representation.

STATE_DIFF.description: The change in state applied in this block, given as a mapping of addresses to the new values and/or new contracts

items.description: The changes in the storage per contract address
The hash of the declared class

items.title: New classes
items.description: The declared class hash and compiled class hash

class_hash.title: Class hash
class_hash.description: The hash of the declared class

compiled_class_hash.title: Compiled class hash
compiled_class_hash.description: The Cairo assembly hash corresponding to the declared class

items.title: Migrated classes
items.description: The class hash and the new Blake-migrated compiled class hash

compiled_class_hash.title: Compiled class hash
compiled_class_hash.description: The Blake-migrated Cairo assembly hash corresponding to the class

items.description: A new contract deployed as part of the state update
The list of contracts whose class was replaced
items.title: Replaced class

contract_address.title: Contract address
contract_address.description: The address of the contract whose class was replaced

items.title: Nonce update
items.description: The updated nonce per contract address

nonce.title: Nonce
nonce.description: The nonce for the given address at the end of the block

STORAGE_KEY.title: Storage key
STORAGE_KEY.$comment: A storage key, represented as a string of hex digits
STORAGE_KEY.description: A storage key. Represented as up to 62 hex digits, 3 bits, and 5 leading zeroes.

ETH_ADDRESS.title: Ethereum address
ETH_ADDRESS.description: an ethereum address represented as 40 hex digits

TXN_HASH.description: The hash of a Starknet transaction
TXN_HASH.title: Transaction hash

L1_TXN_HASH.description: The hash of an Ethereum transaction

FELT.title: Field element
FELT.description: A field element. represented by at most 63 hex digits

transactions.title: Transaction hashes
transactions.description: The hashes of the transactions included in this block

items.description: The hash of a single transaction

BLOCK_BODY_WITH_RECEIPTS.title: Block body with transactions and receipts

parent_hash.title: Parent hash
parent_hash.description: The hash of this block's parent

timestamp.title: Timestamp
timestamp.description: The time in which the block was created, encoded in Unix time

sequencer_address.title: Sequencer address
sequencer_address.description: The StarkNet identity of the sequencer submitting this block

l1_gas_price.title: L1 gas price
l1_gas_price.description: The price of l1 gas in the block

l2_gas_price.title: L2 gas price
l2_gas_price.description: The price of l2 gas in the block

l1_data_gas_price.title: L1 data gas price
l1_data_gas_price.description: The price of l1 data gas in the block

l1_da_mode.title: L1 da mode
l1_da_mode.description: specifies whether the data of this block is published via blob data or calldata

starknet_version.title: Starknet version
starknet_version.description: Semver of the current Starknet protocol

event_commitment.title: Event commitment
event_commitment.description: The root of Merkle Patricia trie for events in the block. For blocks where this data is not available (e.g., old blocks), use 0x0

transaction_commitment.title: Transaction commitment
transaction_commitment.description: The root of Merkle Patricia trie for transactions in the block. For blocks where this data is not available (e.g., old blocks), use 0x0

receipt_commitment.title: Receipt commitment
receipt_commitment.description: The root of Merkle Patricia trie for receipts in the block. For blocks where this data is not available (e.g., old blocks), use 0x0

state_diff_commitment.title: State diff commitment
state_diff_commitment.description: The state diff commitment hash in the block. For blocks where this data is not available (e.g., old blocks), use 0x0

event_count.title: Event count
event_count.description: The number of events in the block

transaction_count.title: Transaction count
transaction_count.description: The number of transactions in the block

state_diff_length.title: State diff length
state_diff_length.description: The length of the state diff in the block. For blocks where this data is not available (e.g., old blocks), compute from state diff if possible, otherwise use 0

block_number.description: The block number of the block that the proposer is currently building. Note that this is a local view of the node, whose accuracy depends on its polling interval length.

timestamp.description: The time in which the block was created, encoded in Unix time

sierra_program.title: Sierra program
sierra_program.description: The list of Sierra instructions of which the program consists

contract_class_version.title: Contract class version
contract_class_version.description: The version of the contract class object. Currently, the Starknet OS supports version 0.1.0

abi.title: ABI
abi.description: The class ABI, as supplied by the user declaring the class

DEPRECATED_CONTRACT_CLASS.title: Deprecated contract class
DEPRECATED_CONTRACT_CLASS.description: The definition of a StarkNet contract class

program.title: Program
program.description: A base64 representation of the compressed program code

offset.title: Offset
offset.description: The offset of the entry point in the program

selector.title: Selector
selector.description: A unique identifier of the entry point (function) in the program

selector.title: Selector
selector.description: A unique identifier of the entry point (function) in the program

function_idx.title: Function index
function_idx.description: The index of the function in the program

offset.title: Offset
offset.description: offset of this property within the struct

SIMULATION_FLAG_FOR_ESTIMATE_FEE.description: Flags that indicate how to simulate a given transaction. By default, the sequencer behavior is replicated locally

PRICE_UNIT.title: Price unit
PRICE_UNIT.description: Units in which the fee is given

l1_gas_consumed.title: L1 gas consumed
l1_gas_consumed.description: The Ethereum gas consumption of the transaction, charged for L1->L2 messages and, depending on the block's DA_MODE, state diffs

l1_gas_price.title: L1 gas price
l1_gas_price.description: The gas price (in wei or fri, depending on the tx version) that was used in the cost estimation

l2_gas_consumed.title: L2 gas consumed
l2_gas_consumed.description: The L2 gas consumption of the transaction

l2_gas_price.title: L2 gas price
l2_gas_price.description: The L2 gas price (in wei or fri, depending on the tx version) that was used in the cost estimation

l1_data_gas_consumed.title: L1 data gas consumed
l1_data_gas_consumed.description: The Ethereum data gas consumption of the transaction

l1_data_gas_price.title: L1 data gas price
l1_data_gas_price.description: The data gas price (in wei or fri, depending on the tx version) that was used in the cost estimation

overall_fee.title: Overall fee
overall_fee.description: The estimated fee for the transaction (in wei or fri, depending on the tx version), equals to l1_gas_consumed*l1_gas_price + l1_data_gas_consumed*l1_data_gas_price + l2_gas_consumed*l2_gas_price

unit.title: Fee unit
unit.description: Units in which the fee is given, can only be FRI

unit.title: Fee unit
unit.description: Units in which the fee is given, can only be WEI

FEE_PAYMENT.title: Fee Payment
FEE_PAYMENT.description: fee payment info as it appears in receipts

unit.title: Fee unit
unit.description: units in which the fee is given

DA_MODE.title: DA mode
DA_MODE.description: Specifies a storage domain in Starknet. Each domain has different guarantees regarding availability

l1_gas.title: L1 Gas
l1_gas.description: The max amount and max price per unit of L1 gas used in this tx

l1_data_gas.title: L1 Data Gas
l1_data_gas.description: The max amount and max price per unit of L1 blob gas used in this tx

l2_gas.title: L2 Gas
l2_gas.description: The max amount and max price per unit of L2 gas used in this tx

max_amount.title: max amount
max_amount.description: the max amount of the resource that can be used in the tx

max_price_per_unit.title: max price
max_price_per_unit.description: the max price per unit of this resource for this tx

price_in_fri.title: price in fri
price_in_fri.description: the price of one unit of the given resource, denominated in fri (10^-18 strk)

price_in_wei.title: price in wei
price_in_wei.description: the price of one unit of the given resource, denominated in wei

EXECUTION_RESOURCES.title: Execution resources
EXECUTION_RESOURCES.description: the resources consumed by the transaction

l1_gas.title: L1Gas
l1_gas.description: l1 gas consumed by this transaction, used for l2-->l1 messages and state updates if blobs are not used

l1_data_gas.title: L1DataGas
l1_data_gas.description: data gas consumed by this transaction, 0 if blobs are not used

l2_gas.title: L2Gas
l2_gas.description: l2 gas consumed by this transaction, used for computation and calldata

MERKLE_NODE.title: MP node
MERKLE_NODE.description: a node in the Merkle-Patricia tree, can be a leaf, binary node, or an edge node

BINARY_NODE.description: an internal node whose both children are non-zero

left.description: the hash of the left child

right.description: the hash of the right child

EDGE_NODE.description: represents a path to the highest non-zero descendant node

path.description: an unsigned integer whose binary representation represents the path from the current node to its highest non-zero descendant (bounded by 2^251)

length.description: the length of the path (bounded by 251)

child.description: the hash of the unique non-zero maximal-height descendant node

NODE_HASH_TO_NODE_MAPPING.description: a node_hash -> node mapping of all the nodes in the union of the paths between the requested leaves and the root

CONTRACT_EXECUTION_ERROR.description: structured error that can later be processed by wallets or sdks
CONTRACT_EXECUTION_ERROR.title: contract execution error

CONTRACT_EXECUTION_ERROR_INNER.description: structured error that can later be processed by wallets or sdks
CONTRACT_EXECUTION_ERROR_INNER.title: contract execution error

ENTRYPOINT_NOT_FOUND.message: Requested entry point does not exist in the contract

INVALID_TXN_INDEX.message: Invalid transaction index in a block

PAGE_SIZE_TOO_BIG.message: Requested page size is too big

INVALID_CONTINUATION_TOKEN.message: The supplied continuation token is invalid or unknown

TOO_MANY_KEYS_IN_FILTER.message: Too many keys provided in a filter

data.description: More data about the execution failure

revert_error.title: revert error
revert_error.description: the execution trace up to the point of failure

data.description: More data about the execution failure

transaction_index.title: Transaction index
transaction_index.description: The index of the first transaction failing in a sequence of given transactions

execution_error.title: revert error
execution_error.description: the execution trace up to the point of failure

STORAGE_PROOF_NOT_SUPPORTED.message: the node doesn't support storage proofs for blocks that are too far in the past
